main: ^Gate guard: Welcome to the great town of Acton, we ho- ... Wait a damn minute, are you a skeleton? I guess the town is open.
^What can you tell me about this city?

c-0: ^Go on, I don't have anything more to say to you.
^But I don't know what happened to me.

c-2: ^Watch your tongue or I'll slice it off of you.

c-1: ^Go on, I don't have anything more to say to you.
^But I don't know what happened to me.
